roleset.name: expose or overexpose to light

example.name: overexposure example
example.text: [Pro * 1] Be careful [* 1]not to solarize the film.

example.name: expose to light
example.text: [PRO] To solarize your soil, you must leave a clear plastic tarp on the soil surface.

roleset.note: SOLARIZE-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of propbank, verbnet, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie. (from solarize.01-v)
